title: Seishoujo Kantai Virgin Fleet (Virgin Fleet)
synopsis: In the pre-WWII era, Nakano Naval Academy's special school for girls is codenamed "Virgin Fleet". These girls are gifted with a special form of power known as "Virgin Energy". With the fear of another Russo-Japanese war imminent, rookie pilot Shiokaze Umino must hone her powers to save Japan from complete destruction.
staff: [['Hosoda, Masahiro', ['Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Takahashi, Shigeharu', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Imagawa, Yasuhiro', ['Script', ' Original Creator']], ['Yukino, Satsuki', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
